verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that <S%G5613>after<s%> we were <S%G645>gotten<s%> from them, and had <S%G321>launched,<s%> we <S%G2064>came<s%> with a <S%G2113>straight<s%> <S%G2113>course<s%> to <S%G2972>Coos,<s%> and the day <S%G1836>following<s%> to <S%G4499>Rhodes,<s%> and from <S%G1564>there<s%> to <S%G3959>Patara:<s%>
And <S%G2147>finding<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G1276>sailing<s%> <S%G1276>over<s%> to <S%G5403>Phenicia,<s%> we <S%G1910>went<s%> <S%G1910>aboard,<s%> and <S%G321>set<s%> <S%G321>forth.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when we had <S%G398>discovered<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus,<s%> we <S%G2641>left<s%> it on the <S%G2176>left<s%> hand, and <S%G4126>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> and <S%G2609>landed<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre:<s%> for <S%G1566>there<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> was to <S%G670>unlade<s%> her <S%G1117>burden.<s%>

And <S%G429>finding<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> we <S%G1961>tarried<s%> <S%G847>there<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days:<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> that he should not <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> we had <S%G1822>accomplished<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> we <S%G1831>departed<s%> and <S%G4198>went<s%> our <S%G4311>way;<s%> and they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4311>brought<s%> us <S%G1909>on<s%> our <S%G4311>way,<s%> with <S%G1135>wives<s%> and <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> we were out of the <S%G4172>city:<s%> and we <S%G5087>kneeled<s%> <S%G1119><s%> down <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G123>shore,<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed.<s%>

And when we had <S%G782>taken<s%> our <S%G782>leave<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> of <S%G240>another,<s%> we <S%G1910>took<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4143>ship;<s%> and they <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G2398>home<s%> <S%G5290>again.<s%>

And when we had <S%G1274>finished<s%> our <S%G4144>course<s%> from <S%G5184>Tyre,<s%> we <S%G2658>came<s%> to <S%G4424>Ptolemais,<s%> and <S%G782>saluted<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G3306>stayed<s%> with them <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

And the <S%G1887>next<s%> day we that were of <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G4012>company<s%> <S%G1831>departed,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea:<s%> and we <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G5376>Philip<s%> the <S%G2099>evangelist,<s%> which was one of the <S%G2033>seven;<s%> and <S%G3306>stayed<s%> with him.

And as we <S%G1961>tarried<s%> there <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> there <S%G2718>came<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> from <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G13>Agabus.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> we <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G5037>both<s%> we, and they of that <S%G1786>place,<s%> <S%G3870>sought<s%> him not to <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4160>mean<s%> you to <S%G2799>weep<s%> and to <S%G4919>break<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2588>heart?<s%> for I am <S%G2093>ready<s%> not to be <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> for the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And when he would not be <S%G3982>persuaded,<s%> we <S%G2270>ceased,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> The <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>
And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> we <S%G643>took<s%> up our <S%G643>carriages,<s%> and <S%G305>went<s%> up to <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

There <S%G4905>went<s%> with us <S%G2532>also<s%> certain of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> with them <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G3416>Mnason<s%> of <S%G2954>Cyprus,<s%> an <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> with <S%G3739>whom<s%> we should <S%G3579>lodge.<s%>
And when we were <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> us <S%G780>gladly.<s%>
And the day <S%G1966>following<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1524>went<s%> in with us to <S%G2385>James;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> were <S%G3854>present.<s%>

And when he had <S%G782>saluted<s%> them, he <S%G1834>declared<s%> <S%G1520>particularly<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> things <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>worked<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> by his <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You <S%G2334>see,<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G3461>thousands<s%> of <S%G2453>Jews<s%> there are <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4100>believe;<s%> and they are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> of the <S%G3551>law:<s%>

And they are <S%G2727>informed<s%> of you, that you <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which are <S%G2596>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to <S%G646>forsake<s%> <S%G575><s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they ought not to <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> their <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> after the <S%G1485>customs.<s%>

As <S%G4012>touching<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> which <S%G4100>believe,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1989>written<s%> and <S%G2919>concluded<s%> that they <S%G5083>observe<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> thing, <S%G1508>save<s%> only that they <S%G5442>keep<s%> themselves from things <S%G1494>offered<s%> to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> and from <S%G129>blood,<s%> and from <S%G4156>strangled,<s%> and from <S%G4202>fornication.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G435>men,<s%> and the <S%G2192>next<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G48>purifying<s%> himself with them <S%G1524>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> to <S%G1229>signify<s%> the <S%G1604>accomplishment<s%> of the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G49>purification,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> that an <S%G4376>offering<s%> should be <S%G4374>offered<s%> for <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them.

(For they had <S%G4308>seen<s%> <S%G4308>before<s%> with him in the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%> an <S%G2180>Ephesian,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G3543>supposed<s%> that <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G1521>brought<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple.<s%>)

And <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G1096>came<s%> on the <S%G304>stairs,<s%> <S%G4819>so<s%> it was, that he was <S%G941>borne<s%> of the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> for the <S%G970>violence<s%> of the <S%G3793>people.<s%>
For the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> after, <S%G2896>crying,<s%> <S%G142>Away<s%> with him.

And as <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was to be <S%G1521>led<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>castle,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain,<s%> <S%G1832>May<s%> I <S%G2036>speak<s%> to you? <S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1097>Can<s%> you <S%G1097>speak<s%> <S%G1676>Greek?<s%>

<S%G1488>Are<s%> not you that <S%G124>Egyptian,<s%> which <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G387>made<s%> an <S%G387>uproar,<s%> and <S%G1806>led<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> that were <S%G4607>murderers?<s%>

But <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> which am a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> of <S%G5018>Tarsus,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> in <S%G2791>Cilicia,<s%> a <S%G4177>citizen<s%> of <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G767>mean<s%> <S%G4172>city:<s%> and, I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> you, <S%G2010>suffer<s%> me to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And when he had given him <S%G2010>license,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G304>stairs,<s%> and <S%G2678>beckoned<s%> with the <S%G5495>hand<s%> to the <S%G2992>people.<s%> And when there was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4602>silence,<s%> he <S%G4377>spoke<s%> to them in the <S%G1446>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1258>tongue,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>
